name: Shrimp Etouffee II
author: TEXICANTWIN
summary: This is a very easy shrimp etouffe recipe that utilizes your microwave! I usually add four dashes of hot pepper sauce to the dish, but bring the hot stuff to the table in case someone wants a zestier dinner! This recipe is one I learned while going to school in southern Louisiana - Geaux Tigers!
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
¼ teaspoon hot pepper sauce to taste
directions: In a 2 quart microwave safe dish, combine margarine, onion, green onion, bell pepper, garlic and celery
Heat on High settings for 8 to 9 minutes
Stir in parsley, tomato paste, soup, shrimp, salt, hot pepper sauce and cayenne
Heat on High setting for 5 minutes
Stir and cook for another 5 minutes until mixture thickens
